pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ðŸ¤— AutoTrain AdvancedAutoTrain Advanced: faster and easier training and deployments of state-of-the-art machine learning models## InstallationYou can Install AutoTrain-Advanced python package via PIP. Please note you will need python >= 3.8 for AutoTrain Advanced to work properly. pip install autotrain-advanced Please make sure that you have git lfs installed. Check out the instructions here: https://github.com/git-lfs/git-lfs/wiki/Installation## Coming Soon!
